page.title: 07 FARMING
page.content:
The two farms around Hampton Lucy, Old Pastures Farm and Tile Barn Farm, have been combined into one of 250 hectares owned by a lady living in Stratford-on-Avon and run by a farm manager.
The soils are light and sandy on the flat ground. In the river meadows the soil is alluvial,and on the higher ground it is mainly of marl.
The small mixed farms have given way to a more specialised farming involving the growing of oil-seed rape and potatoes together with some dairy and sheep farming.
A small woodland,Half Moon Spinney, is left as cover for game.
